name: Choquequirao Trek
description: This trek enables to get a first hand view of the unique Inca settlement perched about the Apurimac Canyon, know by many as mighty river in Quechua “the Talking God”.Here a series of impressive Inca sites have been found.This trek combines Inca remains,unforgettable views of the magnificient mountains,ecological zones with exuberant and diversity vegetation,species of orchids, which are the most beautiful ,diversified and evolved flowers in the vegetable kingdom and fauna with numerous species of insects, birds and the most representative of this area in the Andean condor(vulture gryphus).Our trek start in the village of Cachora and ends at the same village.
